string-array.name: above40to50
string-array.item: You may be too hot to handle. But\, so is this weather
Caution! Phone might melt (Not cause you\'re hot)
You\'ll be tired of Mothafucking sweat on your Mothafucking face
It\'s a bonfire, turn the A/C on, \nSun burnin\' everything you muthafuckas talk about

string-array.name: above30to40
string-array.item: Pretty hot, but your balls should be alright
